website_summaries.verdict: The overall response for the On Cloudace has been very positive. Users loved its durability, color tones, and lightweight structure. The casual shoe-enthusiasts were also satisfied and happy about its great-looking design and performance on different surfaces. Although several of them have issues with breathability and the firm cloud pods, others still recommend the On Cloudace for those who are looking for a shoe with the right blend of comfort, flexibility, stability, support, and quality.
pros: A good number of buyers commented that the shoe was supportive
It was comfortable, according to several runners
The On Cloudace is best for road and trail running activities because of its excellent traction, based on some reviews
A significant number of wearers noted that the footwear was lightweight
A lot of consumers noted that the footwear was well-cushioned
A bouncier ride was experienced by many runners
A handful of wearers lauded the shoe's durability
According to those who have tried it, it is a good-looking shoe because of its earthy color schemes
Based on reviews, the On Cloudace was flexible
The excellent traction provided by the outsole was appreciated by a lot of runners
cons: Some consumers felt hot during the running activity
They said that the shoe was not breathable
According to one of the users, the cloud pods in the back area of the On Cloudace were firmer when compared to previous models

customer_reviews.title: Are so comfortable but don’t wear often and just realized today the ...
customer_reviews.text: Are so comfortable but don’t wear often and just realized today the sole of shoe and side is coming apart like separating from the sole so not a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Meusborn

customer_reviews.title: Love ON shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love ON shoes, this is probably my 6th pairs. As packaged, the slip on/off laces are fun and a time saver (tie laces are included if you want them). My feet are very wide and these shoes are flexible enough to accommodate them.
customer_reviews.author: FranW

customer_reviews.title: They don’t make them like they used to...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of “On”s. I still have my first pair and they got me through two half marathons and training. This pair- wore them five times and they tore in a place that you can’t tie them anymore. Amazon refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I recently purchased this pair of On Cloud shoes. The shoes are not old at all, worn less than a month. 24 days to be exact. I am very disappointed that the back of the shoes have already worn out like this. I take very good care of these shoes and while It has been less than a month of wearing them, they look like shoes I've had for years. I would like to return this pair for a new pair. I attached a picture of the shoes below as well as my order.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I do not run. I got the shoes for comfort and the shock absorbing sole. I have some back problems and feet with extremely high arches. Fit is perfect and the soles helped back soreness. A little on the expensive side, but if you hurt, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Cut heel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and do not fit like my other two I bought previously. Smaller fit which was weird because they always fit so well. Second now that they have broken in the heel is digging into me. This will be my last pair if they do not replace them. I’m passed the warranty because I gave them a chance to break in.
customer_reviews.author: MikeC

customer_reviews.title: Good looking comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality shoe overall. Very comfortable considering I ordered a 10 and usually wear a 10.5 mizuno. It’s very light compared to the mizuno running shoes I wear. Hopefully they last as long. I’m very happy with this shoe and will look for more to purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my very difficult husband, When he loves something it's only thing he wears like he didn't have any other clothes or shoes. So it was difficult to buy him shoes but I have to say he loves these, he runs with them, wear them anytime he does have to wear dressing shoes. The size was perfect 7.5, first he said it was little tight was just pleasing me but after few use he never complaint and now he's asking for a new pair like this haaa..
customer_reviews.author: mimie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the money. Company doesn't stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: This was my third pair of Ons. After wearing once or twice a week for a couple if months, one shoe began squeaking with each step. It was super annoying. I made sure that they were dry as I thought maybe some water has gotten trapped in the shoe causing the squeak. It didnt stop. They're super comfortable and great looking shoes. I contacted Amazon to request an exchange or return but the seller wouldn't help, stating that they were out of their warranty time frame. It's very disappointing considering that I only wore them 15 times or so. Now I'm looking for a new brand to try.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie k

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever. Swiss engineering at its best!
customer_reviews.text: OMG This is a fantastic sneaker for running or walking at a good pace. Super comfortable, great support, cushioning, and stability control. It’s like moving on a cloud with fantastic control. (FYI-Correct price is $199.95 direct from ON with no shipping.)
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Mystic

customer_reviews.title: These are the old model and possibly fraud
customer_reviews.text: I took these shoes to my local retailer and they believed that they were fraud. I am returning them. Since On-Running does not sell on Amazon directly, you are risking it big time by buying from vendors like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kim

customer_reviews.title: Runner's World Shoe Advisor is awesome and so are these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Runner's World Shoe Advisor [...] and this was the top pick based on my inputs. Wow, that shoe advisor is awesome. These shoes feel amazing and running is so natural in them. Those guys over at Runner's World really did their homework when it comes to picking shoes, and the guys over at On Running made one very high-quality shoe. Don't skimp out on cheap shoes. Being in the military I run quite frequently. Being cheap I got foot aches and shin splints. I finally began investing in quality shoes and probably won't pay less than $100 for a pair now.
customer_reviews.author: HK416

customer_reviews.title: You pay for return shipping with this vendor.  Great shoes though!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with this brand of shoe. I had to return the pair I purchased because the different styles do have a different fitting it appears. I was very disappointed I had to pay for the return shipping. As a result of that I chose not to purchase from the same vendor. The shoes are amazing.. I bought local to avoid unnecessary shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: James Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but not as comfy as standard CLoud X
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but I don't find them to be as comfortable as the previous regular Cloud X pair. Maybe it's to do with these being waterproof, but they are too tight in the width and squeeze my feet. Like I'm glad to take them off, whereas I could have slept in the standard CLoud X.
customer_reviews.author: Ro66e

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfy, stiff for price tag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I see a lot of people at work wearing them and since we are on our feet for 12 hours they said they were comfy so I got them. But for their price tag they are not that comfy. They have no real cushion to them so dont take shocks well and my calves are a little sore after wearing them for awhile. Not really worth the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Neptune Pictures

customer_reviews.title: ... past 2 years trying to find one that is comfortable, fits correctly and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 pairs of sneakers over the past 2 years trying to find one that is comfortable, fits correctly and looks good. The ON Cloudflow, a Swiss product, dare I say it, The Bomb. The sole make this shoe. It is made of 2 rows of hollow tubes that can be best described as bumpers and provides a soft landing with each step. It has enough cushioning, structure and shock absorbing qualities without going over the top. I purchased this as a second pair to one I purchased in a local retail store. I would highly recommended it for anyone who needs a well cushioned, comfortable, great looking athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Poppie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Little small but not enough to send back. They are good looking and love the design and weight. Going to get another pair half size bigger and see which is better runner, the other will be a walk about town (if we're ever allowed to again)..
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Paid lot of money for this shoes was hoping it would be good quality But it isn’t I don’t even use it for running just everyday use The cloth on the shoes got ripped both sides
customer_reviews.author: Jeco

customer_reviews.title: Advertised one shoe and sent another.
customer_reviews.text: They advertised one shoe and then sent a "similar" shoe but not the one advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Style and Fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little more snug than 'regualar' tie shoes because they are designed to be slipped on/off - not have to be tied. I like that feature. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ZX504

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfotable pair of shoes. Hard soles no give, everyone I walked or ran my fillings rattled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe I've tried
customer_reviews.text: These On Cloud's are by far superior to my Nike and Asic's running shoes, and I thought those were great! Very supportive on long runs, or short jogs. Only complaint is the long shoe laces, I could cut it in half and tie both shoes with 1 lace! Great color choices too.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but poor construction. Breaking apart less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it’s lightweight and comfortable. Wear it mostly indoors. Used for Light running and taking occasional walks outside. However, less than a month in, the seam around the toe area is splitting apart. I expected more durability for a shoe at this price point. I’m afraid it will keep splitting if I keep running with it. See picture. Not sure if I would purchase this brand ever again.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Gummy Bears shoes
customer_reviews.text: I needed new office/running shoes that not only will look good but would actually take my foot pains away and serve as a good running shoe during lunch breaks and after work. Well this thing was made in heaven! Or Sweden ....close enough! Comfort wise it's like wearing gummy bears shoes- hey that's an idea! Seriously this thing is comfy and stylish to da max!
customer_reviews.author: surfer808

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of ON running shoes. Very comfortable, and lot of cushioning. Feels great running or walking. Does have thing laces but you can loop the upper eyes for a secure fit around the ankle. My shoes size in 11, depending on the shoe brand, sometimes I purchase 11.5. In this case went with 11 and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent impact cushion as I walk.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these shoes are lightweight, very comfortable and cushioning as I take a step and they seem to breathe well. As it is winte where I live, the true test will be this coming spring when I get to use them outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: mike gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, I like the bungee laces and the fit is good, I usually get wide width but these are ok! I ordered half a size larger than my regular size. I wore them all day long the first day!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: High Performance Runners
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and style, true to size. I have “normal” width feet. I’ve definitely noticed a difference in longer running endurance. First time wearing ready to wear shoelaces and to my pleasant surprise, they fo not slip off while running. Delivery arrival was awesomely expedited. I only wear these when running but I plan to buy another pair for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Wabisabibobby

customer_reviews.title: Oh Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The second I put these on, took a few steps I knew they were perfect. Insanely comfortable. I hate ordering shoes online b/c of fitting problems. But these r true to my actual size.
customer_reviews.author: johnnypk

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes yet
customer_reviews.text: My Nike Zoom size 12 always fit perfect. These are just the slightest snug. Not enough to bother me and I think they may loosen up after wearing. With that said, these shoes are amazingly comfortable. These will be my new go to brand. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: One shoe ripped after wearing them only 3 times.
customer_reviews.text: So for the 3 times I wore these shoes to run they were great. I have bad knees from my military time and these made my knees feel ok during running. The reason for the two stars is that one shoes has ripped in the tied area around my arches. So now one shoe is completely different than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I run on average 30 miles a week and was looking for a lighter shoe. Since I started to run in the O N brand of shoes a year ago I have not had knee issues. The shoe has good arch support. I found that you should by a size smaller than what you would normally wear. So if you normally take a size 11 get a 10.50.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M

customer_reviews.title: Way Under-sized
customer_reviews.text: Very small fitting. Limited sizes available. Delayed shipping. Returned for credit/refund or new size. No response from supplier in-over a week. Poor Customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Gallum

customer_reviews.title: New cloudflyers defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to my husband's birthday in September and in less than three months the shoes started to fall appart. He runs 3 miles once a weeks, so the are still relatively new. Is possible that these pair came in defective, unfortunately the return window is closed now... I wish the could consider replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Morao

customer_reviews.title: I’d go with the “flows” before...
customer_reviews.text: I like my cloud flows much better. These feel tight and constricting. The price is a bit high compared to my flows
customer_reviews.author: D Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best running ever
customer_reviews.text: These running shoes are so comfortable and light. I plan on running 2 Spartan races in March. I will report after this period with additional comments.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Shindle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent activity shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a pair of ON running shoes for while and finally broke down and bought a pair. They did not require much breaking in and ive been active in them since day two. The quick lace feature is perfect. It happened to be a very wet and raining time when i bought them so I immediately purchased the same pair, but in the waterproof version. Glad I found these on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Only had the shoes for three months and i loved them, that is until I was tying them on and the entire mesh part of the shoe ripped as i sinched the laces down at the mid foot
customer_reviews.author: zona86

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a pair of these three years ago and they are still in good shape... I couldn't find them in my area so found them on amazon and went ahead an purchased them.. very happy I did
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for running
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes. So far so good for running, lightweight, comfortable. It's different from what I wear usually so I need to get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Armelle LE GUELTE

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that this was a women’s size, as advertised. However these were huge. The M after 9.5 indicates that it is a men’s size. I did an experiment by ordering an 8.5 from another seller and those had a W and fit me the way I’d expect. Beware these are not properly advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, Poor Material
customer_reviews.text: As many others have expressed the material of the shoe particularly the fabric near the heel falls apart with abrasion of any kind. Less than a month into owning them I noticed the heel started thinning and now there is a massive hole in the heel and its fairly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Home

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. We previously purchased this type of shoe but different color. He loves the brand. It's his 3rd pair from this brand name. This must have been a bad batch from the factory. The sole has started coming apart too soon after only a couple months of running.
customer_reviews.author: christine sioukiouroglou

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and runs very small. Would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: STANLEY J.

customer_reviews.title: Hole In Shoe Causing Blisters
customer_reviews.text: After a few months I started to get blisters on the back of my heel from a hole in the shoe. I did not do any crazy training, it was just from running on a treadmill and walking on pavement. These were probably the most expensive running shoe I have ever purchased based on a raving review from a friend....but boy was he wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC quality, but in no way did it have a larger toebox, and the arch support was higher than most running shoes. I was told both would be the opposite by the other reviews. Too bad this product didn't work for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Giegoldt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It is so comfortable and I wear it as both a casual shoe for walking but even for work.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Banana

customer_reviews.title: Best running/walking shoes I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Cloud 2.0 and these are the best running shoes I have ever worn. I don’t really run, but have been walking about 5 miles a day and these are very light weight with good support. I have a very low arch and have no pain in my feet, which has never happened with any other running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Moore

customer_reviews.title: Check size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but order a full size larger than you normally think you wear...
customer_reviews.author: Gadget userNC

customer_reviews.title: Walking on Clouds
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. Love the way they look. Just a high quality shoe. Would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Peel

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a narrow size 13.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable shoe. I wear this to the gym several days a week and sometimes will stop for groceries on the way home. It's a great shoe and worth the money. I have large & narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stach

customer_reviews.title: love the feel of the sole
customer_reviews.text: Light, love the feel of the sole. Seems like great quality but need a few months to really test. Size is exactly what I wear in most other shoes, and 1/2 Size smaller than what I wear in nike.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy but not enough cushion on the soles
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy but not enough cushion on the soles. Not as anti slip as women's version I've purchased in the past. women's version is much more comfortable for walking on concrete floors all day.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Bowes

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cool shoe for less than a month , then go for it. After a month of "just running" all the shoe's joints start to fall apart . When contacted the seller for replacement, they rejected the request and they avoided taking the responsibility of the bad product
customer_reviews.author: Havij

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes! They fit perfectly since the first time i put them on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sosten

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ok for walking Heel support is weak and does not cup heel
customer_reviews.author: Foundryman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and versatile shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lightweight shoe that is extremely unique, high quality and versatile! I wear these shoes with shorts, jeans, and even slacks if I want to dress them down. I constantly get compliments as many people in my city have never seen or heard of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Horn

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy from again!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit iffy in ordering since these were not coming straight from On but I am absolutely in love with them! They exceeded my expectations in person! And fit like a glove! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: Nice for around the house or pool. Going back to my Nikes
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: ... problems with his feet and these are the most comfortable shoes that he's ever worn
customer_reviews.text: My husband is not a runner but does have problems with his feet and these are the most comfortable shoes that he's ever worn. Highly recommended shoes
customer_reviews.author: Tina H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running shoes for thin feet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fitting sneakers for my thin feet. Great support for arches. Fantastic for running I have purchased 2 times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Client Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered a wide for but regular size came. So if I were to try a wide this review may be different. Shoes are very tight. Beautiful however.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wicker

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Great stability running shoe that looks just as good as they feel. These are my second pair and will continue to buy these as long as they are making them!
customer_reviews.author: Aims

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. It’s very comfortable and fits true to size. No issues at all on the first run.
customer_reviews.author: K_H_B

customer_reviews.title: Elastic ties - genius!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are stylish, made well and the mesh rose sand color goes with everything. My favorite part is the elastic ties. SO easy to just slip the shoe on and go! No need to tie or worry about it coming untied.
customer_reviews.author: Rubadub

customer_reviews.title: We Love ON's
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband, he has a few pairs of ON's and they are the most light weight sneakers. When he opened the box and saw these he smiled from ear to ear.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Allen

customer_reviews.title: Gift to my husband
customer_reviews.text: The fit is streamlined to the foot and has a lower profile ..I love the look
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, very light weight. It’s designed as as laced slip on. I would prefer a fully laced design.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This is my first pair and will continue to buy ON shoes for running from now on
customer_reviews.author: brett a williamson

customer_reviews.title: Feel Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought first time , feel good and looks good. I like it very much and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really high quality. Initially I was skeptical of the price, but after 6 months of wearing them and all the hard miles I've put on them, I honestly can't find a single fault with these shoes. The stitching and craftsmanship of the shoes overall seem to be very solid. Nothing has started to fall apart as I've seen with other name brand shoes in the same amount of time wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves the shoe. So light and he loves it for travel
customer_reviews.author: DanceChauffeur

customer_reviews.title: Light and supportive
customer_reviews.text: These shows are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sneakers out there
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Albeit, the are very pricey, but quality and comfort make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Unhappy with Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product is wonderful but have had issues with Seller and its pricing and return policy. Seller does not provide proper customer support and charges undisclosed restocking fees that on returns.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart F.

customer_reviews.title: Only after having them for a month and half the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only after having them for a month and half the whole toe rubber part on both shoes peeled back. Not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for runners with knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 acl reconstructions over the past 10 years. I like to run but have had a lot of pain and discomfort. These shoes have actually relieved most of the pain. I've ran 4-5 miles a few times now with no discomfort. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome! I have been running and racing in triathlons ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! I have been running and racing in triathlons for a long time and these running shoes may be one of the most comfortable shoes I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes I have ever purchased! They fit perfectly and I love not having to tie laces. I will definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous69

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at the best price I can find!
customer_reviews.text: So far, out of the box it fits perfectly. Jogged around the house and feels like I'm only wearing socks! In time, we'll see the durability of this shoes! Looks great and very flexible!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Balce

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: picks up rocks if you don't run on pavement. Heel wore out way to soon.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Poulsen

customer_reviews.title: Name matches...you'll feel you are running on clows
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes I have owned and I've been running 15 years from 5Ks to half marathons and half ironman distance triathlons
customer_reviews.author: Marsgar

customer_reviews.title: Really great for heal strikers!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice pair of running shoes, definitely very comfortable and erased the knee pain I was getting from my previous running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect would keep it but need to return and order 10.5 in size. Why you don’t give people an exchange option to different size in the opinion?
customer_reviews.author: Susie_Huang

customer_reviews.title: Way to small
customer_reviews.text: It was way to small ordered of a pair of shoes made by the same company and they was about 3 sizes to small
customer_reviews.author: william higgenbottom

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The product fits perfect! They are light weight and very comfortable! I have absolutely no complains!
customer_reviews.author: Gtango

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for wide feet. Offers great support and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Incredible shoe
customer_reviews.text: Work on my feet in hospital for long shifts, this shoe is first to leave my feet happy at end of my day. Truly a versatile, well made shoe 👍
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Quality running shoe
customer_reviews.text: My feet are different sizes. Fit the foot I bought them for perfect. Arch support was a little off on the other but the shoe was extremely comfortable overall
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Broke both legs, ankles and heels in a MX wreck so I HAVE to have comfortable shoes and these did not disappoint. They are by far THE most comfortable sneakers I've owned. And I've tried them all. They're super light and you definitely get a good breeze through the toe section. The tubes in the soles are genius. I will never not own a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and comfortable. I like the elastic laces which make these slip on if desired. My second pair.
customer_reviews.author: FWTFtWorth

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My intentions were to workout in theses shoes but will not be doing that. Not as cushioned as my brooks also the heel comes up a bit further on my ankle than I like. Overall a bit disappointed in the comfort of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. Using for daily knock around. Ordered pair for my wife and she loves hers.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Burke

customer_reviews.title: High ankle
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of this shoe but I can't wear them because the back heal is so high it digs into my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Scot MacDonell

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Shoe Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I've ever worn. Get these before they become the next big craze and are impossible to find.
customer_reviews.author: rtisme

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy running in these shoes but my times have gone ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy running in these shoes but my times have gone in the wrong direction. LOL. Asics seem to improve my time. I am going to break these in over the next month. I have a half marathon and a few 5k's happening in the next month. Will put them to the test and see how they do. Love the look. Feel is good. Price is a little high but they keep my joints and knees from aching... will be well worth the money. Provide an update after I do a month of heavy running in these.
customer_reviews.author: greenwolf

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: my husband swears by these shoes and these are the only ones I can order for him now...
customer_reviews.author: Caroline F.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe overall
customer_reviews.text: Not enough padding for my admittedly novice running tastes. Made landings a little jarring but other than that a solid shoe.
customer_reviews.author: michael d.

customer_reviews.title: True to fit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fit and plan to purchase these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Land

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These shoes are awesome! I see now why they’re called On Clouds, because it literally feels like you’re walking on clouds! If you’re thinking about getting a pair, bite the bullet and do it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: On Running Mens Cloudace Textile Synthetic Trainers
product_meta.description: On Running Mens Cloudace Textile Synthetic Trainers
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh and PU upper with synthetic overlays for structural support
Breathable textile lining for healthy in-shoe climate
Removable EVA insole for cushioning and support
CloudTec cushioning technology active only during the foot strike
Lightweight and flexible CloudTec sole unit made from Zero-Gravity foam
